promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young simple serpent fighting-type pokemon wearing a dark crown. It can be found in canyon-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Canyobra, a a chibi young simple serpent fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in canyon-like environments It has the following abilities: Gentle Kick, Battle Step. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "fighting" or "Canyobra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, serpent-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: In rocky terrains dwells the mischievous Canyobra, a tiny, agile combatant. Using its Gentle Kick and Battle Step, it playfully challenges foes and leaps among cliffs.
